OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope of the connector, e.g. 'sentinelone'.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_ID.description: The ID of the live stream to connect to.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_LISTEN_DELETE.description: Whether to listen for delete events on the live stream.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_NO_DEPENDENCIES.description: Whether to ignore dependencies when processing events from the live stream.

SENTINELONE_INTEL_API_URL.description: The base URL of your SentinelOne management console

SENTINELONE_INTEL_API_KEY.description: The API key for your SentinelOne management console

SENTINELONE_INTEL_ACCOUNT_ID.description: The Account ID for your SentinelOne management console

SENTINELONE_INTEL_SITE_ID.description: The Site ID for your SentinelOne management console

SENTINELONE_INTEL_GROUP_ID.description: The Group ID for your SentinelOne management console
